body_html:
Should it not be

#include "THC/THC.h"
#include "THS/THSTensor.h"

and should not the build scripts include the system includes after all torch-specific includes?

otherwise, this may manifest on other occasions with updating the source-installed torch distributions
body:
Should it not be 
```
#include "THC/THC.h"
#include "THS/THSTensor.h"
```

and should not the build scripts include the system includes after all torch-specific includes?

otherwise, this may manifest on other occasions with updating the source-installed torch distributions
